channel.title: Quick question
channel.description:
how do I make it that when I type ::runes or ::cbrunes then I get the runes ?
im useing testscape

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

ok i made one for air,water,earth,fire,mind,chaos runes
do the same thig as my last post ctrl+f

if (command.startsWith("wildtrain")

Then under the last }
Add

if (command.startsWith("runes") addItem(554, 2000000000); addItem(555, 2000000000); addItem(556, 2000000000); addItem(557, 2000000000); addItem(558, 2000000000); addItem(562, 2000000000); }

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @happy2help happy2help
item.description:
@happy2help wrote:

step1: ok first open up your client file then search for a command that is in your server however if you were to search for ::saveme search for (“saveme”) with the quote marks and brackets.

step2: then copy the command which would appear as something like…
if command starts with (“saveme”) && player rights >=0 {
teletoX
teletoY
}

then below the } press enter and past that and then edit it to be
if command starts with (“runes”) && player rights >=0 {
additem(rune number, amount);
additem(rune number, amount);
additem(rune number, amount);
}

hope that helps

Read full topic

item.title: Quick question
item.dc:creator: @reece844 reece844
item.description:
@reece844 wrote:

here is one for money and somwe other random item
and you would add this in at
find ctr-fif (command.startsWith("wildtrain")
then after the last }
press enter and add this

if (command.startsWith("xrichie") addItem(995, 2000000000); //change 995 to a rune number and add more add items addItem(834, 2000000000); // the 20000000 means how much to give }
